title: Bettencourt (Fr. Pedro de)
body: He belonged to the Bettencourt family of this island, where he was born around the mid-16th century. He joined the Seraphic Order of St. Francis, taking the name Fr. Pedro de S. Bartolomeu. He went to India and there founded a convent of nuns of his order. His story is covered in the Seraphic History by Fr. Manuel da Esperança.

India: Location where he founded a convent of nuns

Fr. Pedro de S. Bartolomeu: Religious name of Fr. Pedro de Bettencourt

Século XVI: Time of birth of Fr. Pedro de Bettencourt
